name: BrucellosisTestsForBrucellaSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Brucellosis (Tests for Brucella species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Brucella organism),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Brucella sp culture or isolate;  

LOINC search: Brucella culture -milk),(Exclusion Criteria: Milk)
